name: Deliverey
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 46 in 72 hours, it is a pretty rough prototype, you have been warned.

Deliver boxes in VR!

This game features some pretty intense VR car driving, if you're sensitive to motion sickness this might not work out great for you and I apologize for not being more considerate.

This game was build with SteamVR and uses the SteamVR input system, any VR headsets that work with SteamVR should work with this game.
Motion controllers required.
